attacks.name: Blot
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.text: If this Pokémon's remaining HP is 50 or less, its attacks do 70 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Green Force
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bug Hunch
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Grass Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Screech
attacks.text: During your next turn, any damage done to the Defending Pokémon by attacks is increased by 60 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Aromatherapy
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Boo-Hoo
attacks.text: If your opponent attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to the Defending Pokémon during his or her next turn, that Pokémon will be Asleep.

attacks.name: Leaf Slice
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mountain Munch
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Scrape Down
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, discard the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Eruption
attacks.text: Each player discards the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 60 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Spiral Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Strong Flare
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reinforced Flame
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Derail
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Hyper Transfer
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tail Lure
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Careless Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Walk-Off Homer
attacks.text: If you use this attack when you have only 1 Prize card left, you win this game.

abilities.name: Royal Flash
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, move an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psych Up
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Psych Up attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Razor Shell
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Clamp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sudden Grip
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved from Shellder during this turn, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stormy Seas
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your deck for a Water Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Splash Burn
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Blast Geyser
attacks.text: You may do 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

attacks.name: Errand-Running
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Trainer card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Water Splash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Wind Charm
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to each of your Pokémon. (Existing effects are not removed.)

attacks.name: Aqua Turbo
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Water Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Pearl Hurricane
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Aqua Tube
abilities.text: Each of your Pokémon that has any Water Energy attached to it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Mineral Pump
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Round
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of your Pokémon that have the Round attack.

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Siphon Off
attacks.text: Attach 3 Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shaky Fall
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Water Duplicates
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Frogadier and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Shadow Stitching
attacks.text: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, each Pokémon your opponent has in play, in his or her hand, and in his or her discard pile has no Abilities. (This includes cards that come into play on that turn.)

attacks.name: Moonlight Slash
attacks.text: You may return a Water Energy from this Pokémon to your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Giant Water Shuriken
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may discard a Water Energy card from your hand. If you do, put 6 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Snarl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Wild Fury
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Zap Zone
abilities.text: Damage from the attacks of your Lightning Pokémon isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crashing Bolt
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has Fighting Resistance, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Focused Wish
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Goodnight, Babies
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may leave both Active Pokémon Asleep.

attacks.name: Miraculous Shine
attacks.text: Devolve each of your opponent's evolved Pokémon and put the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Reflective Shield
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 5 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psy Report
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

attacks.name: Acid Spray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Garbotoxin
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, each Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities (except for Garbotoxin).

attacks.name: Offensive Bomb
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Energy Present
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stab
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stab Deeply
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Painful Sword
attacks.text: Double the number of damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Megaton Slash
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Ascension
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.name: Nervous Seed
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Basic Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless more.

attacks.name: Energy Press
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Silent Fear
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Watch and Learn
attacks.text: If your opponent's Pokémon used an attack during his or her last turn, use it as this attack.

attacks.name: Never Enough
attacks.text: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Turbo Assault
attacks.text: Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bite Off
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Razor Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Roll Up
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. If any of them are heads, your opponent reveals his or her hand. Then, for each heads, discard a card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Otherworldly Return
attacks.text: Put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Dark Pulse
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Darkness Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Head
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Asleep, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Parting Shot
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 60 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Buster Swing
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Gale Thrust
attacks.text: If this Pokémon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokémon this turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Iron Crusher
attacks.text: You may discard a Special Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon or a Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 60 or less.

attacks.name: Spike Lash
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon for each Colorless in that Pokémon's Retreat Cost. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Double Slap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Moon Barrier
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by Dragon Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Mighty Wind
attacks.text: You may attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hurricane Wing
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Dizzying Cologne
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Severe Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Dragon Pulse
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck.

attacks.name: Dangerous Suspicion
attacks.text: Draw a card. Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Antibodies
abilities.text: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting this Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dirty Shock
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.text: Put damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon until its remaining HP is 10. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Mystifying Horns
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Big Charge
attacks.text: If you have any Mega Evolution Pokémon on your Bench, this attack does 50 more damage.

abilities.name: Purifying Fire
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon has any basic Fire Energy attached to it, you may heal 50 damage from it.

attacks.name: Elemental Feather
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Act Cute
attacks.text: Your opponent puts a card from his or her hand on the bottom of his or her deck.

attacks.name: Nyan Press
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Tight Jaw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: All
rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player's Active Pokémon is Asleep, he or she may remove that Special Condition and heal 30 damage from that Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Bursting Balloon
rules: If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your opponent's turn.If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 6 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Delinquent
rules: Discard any Stadium card in play. If you do, your opponent discards 3 cards from his or her hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Fighting Fury Belt
rules: The Basic Pokémon this card is attached to gets +40 HP and its attacks do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Gyarados Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Gyarados-EX.

name: Max Elixir
rules: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and attach a basic Energy card you find there to a Basic Pokémon on your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Max Potion
rules: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon. Then, discard all Energy attached to that Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Misty's Determination
rules: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, look at the top 8 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Catcher
rules: Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Professor Sycamore
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Psychic's Third Eye
rules: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.Discard as many cards as you like from your hand. Then, draw that many cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Puzzle of Time
rules: You may play 2 Puzzle of Time cards at once.◆ If you played 1 card, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.◆ If you played 2 cards, put 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Reverse Valley
rules: Choose which way this card faces before you play it. The attacks of this â†“ player's Darkness Pokémon do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Scizor Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Scizor-EX.

name: Tierno
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
